summary: A small-town priest struggles with his faith.
cast: Ingrid Thulin|Gunnar Björnstrand|Gunnel Lindblom|Max von Sydow|Allan Edwall|Kolbjörn Knudsen|Olof Thunberg|Elsa Ebbesen|Lars-Olof Andersson|Eddie Axberg|Tor Borong|Lars-Owe Carlberg|Ingmari Hjort|Stefan Larsson|Johan Olafs|Bertha Sånnell|Christer Öhman
title: Los comulgantes
